attachments.name: Step Passed: Send a search request with GET method with invalid NHS Number '10000000000 00001' and valid Disease Type 'COVID19'
Step Passed: The request will be unsuccessful with the status code '400'
Step Passed: The Search Response JSONs should contain correct error message for invalid NHS Number
